<!-- 
//页签切换function switchTag(tag){ tag.blur(); var obj = tag.parentElement; var objlist = document.getElementById("DF_TagGroup").firstChild.childNodes; for(i=0; i < objlist.length; i++) {  if (objlist[i] == obj)  {   objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className="DF_SelectedTag";   objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].getElementsByTagName("span")[0].className="DF_SelectedSpan";   document.all("DF_TagContentgGroup").childNodes[i].className = "DF_SelectedContent";   switch(i)   {       //0对应第一个页签、1对应第二个页签。。。       case 1:       /*开始 引入附件上载的代码*/     if(document.getElementById("spanAttaUNID").innerText!=""){          if (document.all("TFCurNodeID").value=="FlowStartNode")              para = "&type=ntko&flag=1";           else              para = "&type=ntko&flag=0";      url = "/" + document.getElementById("StAttachmentPath").value + "/0/" + document.getElementById("spanAttaUNID").innerText +       "?editdocument&login"+para;     }     else{          if (document.all("TFCurNodeID").value=="FlowStartNode")              para = "&type=ntko&flag=1&unid="+document.getElementById("StMainDocUnid").value+"&key=NTKOAttachMent";      else          para = "&type=ntko&flag=0&unid="+document.getElementById("StMainDocUnid").value+"&key=NTKOAttachMent";                              url = "/" + document.getElementById("StAttachmentPath").value + "/NTKOAttachMent?openform&login"+para;     }     //divNtkoAtta表示附件上传管理控件所在的标签，可以根据实际情况修改     if (document.getElementById("divNtkoAtta").innerHTML == ""){         document.getElementById("divNtkoAtta").innerHTML = "<iframe id='NTKOAttachMent' scrolling=no style='width:100%;' src='"+url+"'></iframe>";     }     break;       case 2:       objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className="DF_SelectedTag";     objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].getElementsByTagName("span")[0].className="DF_SelectedSpan";     document.all("DF_TagContentgGroup").childNodes[i].className = "divVoucher";     break;                   case 3:                                            /*开始 引入流转意见的代码*/                         thFlowWindow_ShowMindInfo("divComments");break;                         /*结束 引入流转意见的代码*/                         break                  case 4:       objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className="DF_SelectedTag";     objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].getElementsByTagName("span")[0].className="DF_SelectedSpan";     document.all("DF_TagContentgGroup").childNodes[i].className = "divDigichannel";     break;               }            }else{   objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className="";   objlist[i].getElementsByTagName("a")[0].getElementsByTagName("span")[0].className="";   document.all("DF_TagContentgGroup").childNodes[i].className = "DF_HideContent";  } }}/* *该函数在点击提交按钮后，在确认对话框中，点击了确定之后被调用；此函数不是必须的； */function thFlowWindow_DoBeforeAgent(){  //文档控件保存      if(document.frames["NTKOOFFICE"])      {     document.frames["NTKOOFFICE"].document.all("BDF_Button_submit").click();  }      //附件管理控件保存      if(document.frames["NTKOAttachMent"])      {     document.frames["NTKOAttachMent"].NTKO_SaveDocWithAttaches();  }   //产生流水号 if(document.all("StFormID").value=="" || document.all("StFormID").value=="false" || document.all("StFormID").value=="undefined"){  var strTime=getStringDate("YYYY","yes");  var strHead="YBFY"  document.all("StFormID").value = getSerialNumber(strHead,strTime,strHead+strTime,"4",""); }}//选择环节处理人function thFlowWindow_SelectNextFlowPsn(nodeid){      DF_SelectPsn("selectMode=checkbox&FieldName=StChgPsnTmpFieldAll&FieldNameCN=StChgPsnTmpFieldCN&FieldNameEN=StChgPsnTmpFieldEN");}function SaveDynTable() {  //生成凭证环节 保存凭证动态表格 if (document.all.VoucherCreateFlag.value == "1") { //alert(document.all("divSAPtbl").innerHTML)  document.getElementById("SAPInputHTML").value = document.all("divSAPtbl").innerHTML; } //保存报销明细表格 if(document.all("TFCurNodeID").value == "FlowStartNode") {  document.all("DynInputHTML").value = document.all("divDyntbl").innerHTML; }}function LoadDynTable() { if(document.all("SAPInputHTML").value != "") {   document.getElementById("divSAPtbl").innerHTML = document.getElementById("SAPInputHTML").value; }  if(document.all("DynInputHTML").value != "") {  document.all("divDyntbl").innerHTML = document.all("DynInputHTML").value; }}function GetMyBank() { var bStr = GetBankInfo(document.all("StBXPsnEN").value); if(bStr != "") {  var bArr = bStr.split("^");  DF_setSelectText("BankInfo", bArr[0]) ;  document.all("StMyBankNum").value = bArr[1]; }}
// -->

<!-- 
document._domino_target = "_self";
function _doClick(v, o, t, h) {
  var form = document._NorFeeAppForm;
  if (form.onsubmit) {
     var retVal = form.onsubmit();
     if (typeof retVal == "boolean" && retVal == false)
       return false;
  }
  var target = document._domino_target;
  if (o.href != null) {
    if (o.target != null)
       target = o.target;
  } else {
    if (t != null)
      target = t;
  }
  form.target = target;
  form.__Click.value = v;
  if (h != null)
    form.action += h;
  form.submit();
  return false;
}
// -->

<!-- 
function SelCurrency() { Select3ColView('RateView', 'StExchangeRate', 'StCurrencyType_1','StCurrencyType', 'btnComRate','BasicData/DFRateBase.nsf')}function ComputeCurrency() { //控制人民币的时候不显示汇率。  if(document.getElementById("StCurrencyType_1").value=="RMB"){  document.all.YBMoney.style.display = "none";  document.getElementById("divrate1").style.display="none";  document.getElementById("divrate2").style.display="none"; } else {  document.all.YBMoney.style.display = "";    document.getElementById("divrate1").style.display="";  document.getElementById("divrate2").style.display=""; }  if(!isNaN(parseFloat(document.getElementById("StTotalMoney").value))) { //获取申请金额{StTotalMoney    document.getElementById("StAppMoney").value=DF_forDight(parseFloat(document.getElementById("StExchangeRate").value)*parseFloat(document.getElementById("StTotalMoney").value),2);  document.getElementById("StCapMoney").value=DF_convertCurrency(document.getElementById("StAppMoney").value)        //实际金额-未冲销借款  var tMon = DF_forDight(parseFloat(document.getElementById("StExchangeRate").value)*parseFloat(document.getElementById("StTotalMoney").value),2);  var dMon = document.getElementById("DebitExpenseMoney").value;  if(isNaN(parseFloat(dMon))) dMon = "0"    document.getElementById("StActualAppMoney").value= DF_forDight(parseFloat(parseFloat(tMon) - parseFloat(dMon)), 2)  document.getElementById("StActualCapMoney").value=DF_convertCurrency(document.getElementById("StActualAppMoney").value)        }     }function GetCusDebit(comCode, cusCode) {  if(DF_Trim(comCode) == "") return false if(DF_Trim(cusCode) == "") return false  //读取员工借款金额。 DC_WriteToSAP("0","0");}

// -->

<!-- 
var tmpObj;//选择日期function SelectDate(){ if(document.all("TFCurNodeID").value != "FlowStartNode") return false DF_fPopCalendar(event.srcElement);}//选择成本中心function SelectCost_1(obj) { if(document.all("TFCurNodeID").value != "FlowStartNode") return false document.all("tmpCol_1").value = ""; document.all("tmpRow_1").value = "";  //JS Header定义全局变量 tmpObj = obj; //SelectClearView('CostCenterView', 'tmpCol_1', 'tmpRow_1', 'btntmp_1','btnclear_1',''); DF_SelectOrg("selectMode=radio&allInfo=no&FieldName=tmpCol_1&OptButtonName=btntmp_1&ReturnStrFormat=json");}//选择内部订单function SelectOrder_1(obj) { if(document.all("TFCurNodeID").value != "FlowStartNode") return false document.all("tmpCol_1").value = ""; document.all("tmpRow_1").value = "";  //JS Header定义全局变量 tmpObj = obj; SelectClearView('InnerOrderView', 'tmpCol_1', 'tmpRow_1', 'btntmp_1','btnclear_1','');}//选择原因代码function SelectSubjectCode(obj) { if(document.all("TFCurNodeID").value != "FlowStartNode") return false  document.all("tmpCol_1").value = ""; document.all("tmpRow_1").value = "";  //JS Header定义全局变量 tmpObj = obj; SelectClearView('FeeSubjcetView', 'tmpCol_1', 'tmpRow_1', 'btntmp_1','btnclear_1', '');}function JudgeCellIsNull(tblName, rowid, colid, minderStr) {  var dltbl = document.all(tblName); if(DF_Trim(dltbl.rows(rowid).cells(colid).childNodes(0).value) == "") {  if(minderStr == "") {   minderStr = "对不起，该信息不能为空";  }  alert(minderStr);  dltbl.rows(rowid).cells(colid).childNodes(0).focus();  return false }  return true}function ComputeExpMoney(obj) { JustNum(obj, ''); obj.value = DF_forDight(obj.value, 2); ComputeExpTotal();}function AddRows() { var sArr = new Array(); for(var i=0; i<9; i++) {  if(i == 1) {   sArr[i] = document.all("DefaultCost").value;  } else {   sArr[i] = "";  } } AddDynRow('tblDynList', 'DynInputXML', sArr);}//表格必填字段控制function JudgeDynTblValues() { var tblObj = document.all("tblDynList"); var rowObj = tblObj.rows; var fsum = 0;   for(var i=1; i<rowObj.length; i++) {  if(DF_Trim(tblObj.rows(i).cells(1).childNodes(0).value) == "") {   alert("对不起，请填写费用产生时间");   //tblObj.rows(i).cells(1).childNodes(0).readOnly = false;   tblObj.rows(i).cells(1).childNodes(0).focus();   return false  }    var scc = DF_Trim(tblObj.rows(i).cells(2).childNodes(0).value);  var sio = DF_Trim(tblObj.rows(i).cells(3).childNodes(0).value);  if(scc == "" && sio == "") {   //tblObj.rows(i).cells(1).childNodes(1).focus();   alert("成本中心和内部订单之中必填一个字段");   return false  }    if(DF_Trim(tblObj.rows(i).cells(5).childNodes(0).value) == "") {      alert("对不起，请选择费用科目");   tblObj.rows(i).cells(5).childNodes(0).focus();   return false  }    if(DF_Trim(tblObj.rows(i).cells(7).childNodes(0).value) == "" || DF_Trim(tblObj.rows(i).cells(7).childNodes(0).value) == 0) {      alert("对不起，请填写报销金额");   tblObj.rows(i).cells(7).childNodes(0).focus();   tblObj.rows(i).cells(7).childNodes(0).readOnly = false;      return false  } }}function ComputeExpTotal() {  var tblObj = document.all("tblDynList"); var rowObj = tblObj.rows; var fsum = 0;   for(var i=1; i<rowObj.length; i++) {  var smon = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 7);  if(smon == "") {   smon = "";  } else {   smon = parseFloat(smon);  }  fsum = parseFloat(parseFloat(fsum) + smon).toFixed(2); }   document.all("StTotalMoney").value = fsum; document.all("StTotalMoneyBig").value = DF_convertCurrency(fsum);  ComputeCurrency();}function CallBudgetNum() {  var tblObj = document.all("tblDynList"); var rowObj = tblObj.rows; for(var i=1; i<rowObj.length; i++) {   var sdate = document.all("SubmitDate").value;  var syear = sdate.substr(0, 4);  var smonth = parseFloat(sdate.substr(5, 2));  var smonth = smonth.toString(10);  var scc = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 2);  var sio = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 3);  var stype = "";  if(scc != ""){   stype = "成本中心";   sarea = scc;  } else if(sio != ""){   stype = "内部订单";   sarea = sio;  }    var rStr = "";  if(document.all("ConBudFlag").value == "0" || document.all("ConBudFlag").value == "") {   rStr = "null";   return false  }    var ssubject = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 5);  var scomany = document.all("StPayCompanyCode").value;    rStr = GetBudgetNum(scomany, stype, sarea, ssubject, syear, smonth);   if(rStr == "false") {   alert("费用明细必填字段未填写完整，请检查！");   return false  } else if(rStr == "null") {   //alert("未查询到预算管控，不控制");  } else if(rStr == "error") {   //alert("读取可用预算失败");  } else {   //正常返回数据   try{    var hh = parseFloat(parseFloat(rStr)/parseFloat(document.all("StExchangeRate").value)).toFixed(2);    rStr = hh;   } catch(e) {   }  }  SetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 6, rStr)  } }function ExpSetField() {  ComputeExpTotal();  //保存写入预算值，同一预算维度进行合并 var tblObj = document.all("tblDynList"); var rowObj = tblObj.rows; var yArr = new Array(); //年 var mArr = new Array(); //月 var tArr = new Array(); //类型 var aArr = new Array(); //成本中心\内部订单 var sArr = new Array(); //科目 var bArr = new Array(); //预算 var eArr = new Array(); //报销金额(原币) var sjArr = new Array(); // 报销金额(人民币)  for(var i=1; i<rowObj.length; i++) {  //为预算关联月从行项目提取留个口  //var sdate = DF_Trim(rowObj[i].cells(1).innerText);  var sdate = document.all("SubmitDate").value  var syear = sdate.substr(0, 4);  var smonth = parseFloat(sdate.substr(5, 2));  var smonth = smonth.toString(10);  var scc = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 2);  //成本中心  var sio = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 3);  //内部订单  var ssubject = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 5); //科目  var sbudget = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 6);  //可用预算  var sexpense = GetCellsValue("tblDynList", i, 7);  //报销金额  var sjexp = parseFloat(parseFloat(sexpense)*parseFloat(document.all("StExchangeRate").value)).toFixed(2);    var stype = "";  var sarea = "";     if(scc != ""){   stype = "成本中心";   sarea = scc;  } else if(sio != ""){   stype = "内部订单";   sarea = sio;  }    if(stype == "") {   alert("归集范围出错，请联系系统管理员！");   return false  }    if(parseFloat(sbudget) < parseFloat(sexpense)) {   alert("对不起，科目[" + ssubject + "]总报销金额已经超过了预算，您将不能提交，请修改");   return false  }    var sflag = false  var slength = yArr.length;  if(slength == 0) {   yArr.push(syear);   mArr.push(smonth);   tArr.push(stype);   aArr.push(sarea);   sArr.push(ssubject);   bArr.push(sbudget);   eArr.push(parseFloat(sexpense));   sjArr.push(parseFloat(sjexp));   sflag = true;  }    for(var k=0; k<slength; k++) {   //alert(syear == yArr[k] && smonth == mArr[k] && stype == tArr[k] && ssubject == sArr)   if(syear == yArr[k] && smonth == mArr[k] && stype == tArr[k] && sarea == aArr[k] && ssubject == sArr[k]) {    eArr[k] = parseFloat(parseFloat(parseFloat(eArr[k]) + parseFloat(sexpense))).toFixed(2);    sjArr[k] = parseFloat(parseFloat(parseFloat(sjArr[k]) + parseFloat(sjexp))).toFixed(2);    if(parseFloat(eArr[k]) > parseFloat(bArr[k])) {     alert("对不起，科目[" + ssubject + "]总报销金额已经超过了预算，您将不能提交，请修改");     return false    }    sflag = true   } else {       }  }    if(sflag == false) {   yArr.push(syear);   mArr.push(smonth);   tArr.push(stype);   aArr.push(sarea);   sArr.push(ssubject);   bArr.push(sbudget);   eArr.push(parseFloat(sexpense));   sjArr.push(parseFloat(sjexp));  } }  document.all("syear").value = yArr.join(";"); document.all("smonth").value = mArr.join(";"); document.all("stype").value = tArr.join(";"); document.all("sarea").value = aArr.join(";"); document.all("ssubject").value = sArr.join(";"); document.all("sbudget").value = bArr.join(";"); document.all("sexpense").value = sjArr.join(";");}function DeleteRow() { DelDynRow('tblDynList'); ComputeExpTotal();}

// -->

function SelectNextPsn(){    if(document.all("MYChgPsnButton")!=null)     {    document.all("MYChgPsnButton").click();     }     else     {   var url="/Produce/OrgMng.nsf/pickPsnByOrg_form?OpenForm&selectMode=checkbox&FieldName=TFCurNodeNextOpters";   window.open(url,'选择办理人','scrollbars=yes,left=80,top=80,width=700,height=350');     }}

<!-- 
var tmpObj;//选择成本中心function SelectCost(obj) {if(document.all.VoucherCreateFlag.value != "1") return false; document.all("tmpCol").value = ""; document.all("tmpRow").value = "";  //JS Header定义全局变量 tmpObj = obj; //SelectClearView('CostCenterView', 'tmpCol_1', 'tmpRow_1', 'btntmp_1','btnclear_1',''); DF_SelectOrg("selectMode=radio&allInfo=no&FieldName=tmpCol&OptButtonName=btntmp&ReturnStrFormat=json");}//选择科目ALLfunction SelectAllSubject(obj) {if(document.all.VoucherCreateFlag.value != "1") return false; document.all("tmpCol").value = ""; document.all("tmpRow").value = "";  //JS Header定义全局变量 tmpObj = obj; SelectClearView('AllSubjcetView', 'tmpCol', 'tmpRow', 'btntmp','btnclear', '');}//选择内部订单function SelectOrder(obj) {if(document.all.VoucherCreateFlag.value != "1") return false; document.all("tmpCol").value = ""; document.all("tmpRow").value = "";  //JS Header定义全局变量 tmpObj = obj; SelectClearView('InnerOrderView', 'tmpCol', 'tmpRow', 'btntmp','btnclear', '');}//选择原因代码function SelectResCode(obj) {if(document.all.VoucherCreateFlag.value != "1") return false; document.all("tmpCol").value = ""; document.all("tmpRow").value = "";  //JS Header定义全局变量 tmpObj = obj; SelectClearView('ReasonCodeView', 'tmpCol', 'tmpRow', 'btntmp','btnclear', '');}function CopyVoucher(tblName) { document.all("VoucherDate").value = getStringDate("YYYY-MM-DD", "yes"); document.all("ChargeDate").value = getStringDate("YYYY-MM-DD", "yes"); document.all("CompanyCode").value = document.all("StPayCompanyCode").value; document.all("Currency").value = "CNY"; document.all("ExangeRate").value = "1";  //有则删除行项目 ChgDynAllRow('tblSAPList'); DelDynRow('tblSAPList'); //生成凭证行项目 createDynRowFromBasicForm("tblDynList",0,"40");}function CreateVoucher(tblName) {  if(document.all("StFlag_1").value == "X") {  alert("对不起，凭证已生成，您不能再生成凭证");  return false }  if(CheckSAPData(tblName) == false) return false  //记录传递SAP凭证生成人，可根据项目要求进行修改 document.all("VouUserName").value = document.all("CurUserNameCN").value;  DC_WriteToSAP("1","0");  //其中第一个参数代表，你要从SAP访问函数，该同digichannel中的key对应。}function CheckSAPData() {  arrField = new Array(); arrRemind = new Array(); var i = 0;  //SAP一般必填 arrField[i]="VoucherDate"; arrRemind[i]="请选择凭证日期！"; i++;  arrField[i]="ChargeDate"; arrRemind[i]="请选择记账日期！"; i++;  arrField[i]="VoucherType"; arrRemind[i]="请选择凭证类型！"; i++;  arrField[i]="CompanyCode"; arrRemind[i]="请选择公司代码！"; i++;  arrField[i]="Currency"; arrRemind[i]="请填写货币代码！"; i++;  if(!DF_checkInput(arrField,arrRemind)) return false  if(document.all("tblSAPList").rows.length < 3) {  alert("对不起，行项目至少两行");  return false }  var tb = document.getElementById("tblSAPList"); //验证凭证信息前3项动态表格不能为空 for (var j = 1;j < tb.rows.length; j++) {  if (tb.rows(j).cells(1).childNodes(0).value == "")  {   tb.rows(j).cells(1).childNodes(0).focus();   alert("该信息不能为空!");   return false;  }  if (tb.rows(j).cells(2).childNodes(0).value == "")  {   tb.rows(j).cells(2).childNodes(0).focus();   alert("该信息不能为空!");   return false;  }  if (tb.rows(j).cells(3).childNodes(0).value == "")  {   tb.rows(j).cells(3).childNodes(0).focus();   alert("该信息不能为空!");   return false;  }   }  return true}function JudgeCellIsNull(tblName, rowid, colid, minderStr) {  var dltbl = document.all(tblName); if(DF_Trim(dltbl.rows(rowid).cells(colid).childNodes(0).value) == "") {  if(minderStr == "") {   minderStr = "对不起，该信息不能为空";  }  alert(minderStr);  dltbl.rows(rowid).cells(colid).childNodes(0).focus();  return false }  return true}//凭证信息数据校验function onblurCheckNum(obj){ if (document.all("VoucherCreateFlag").value != "1")return false; if(obj.value=="") {  obj.value=0 } else {  if(obj.value!=parseFloat(obj.value))          {   alert("请输入数字!");   obj.value=0;   return false;  }    obj.value=DF_forDight(obj.value,2); }}/********************************************函数说明: 根据动态表格明细，创建凭证动态表格参数说明:pDynTable 报销明细动态表格idisCX 是否冲销借款 1为冲销 0为不冲销pstng_code 记账码**********************************************/function createDynRowFromBasicForm(pDynTable,isCX,pstng_code){  var pstng_code = pstng_code;  var dynTable =  document.getElementById(pDynTable); var SAPInputXML = "SAPInputXML"; user =  document.all.PsnCN.value;    //代办人  for(i=1; i < dynTable.rows.length; i++) {  var money ="";  //金额  var cc = "";  // 成本中心  var io = "";  //内部订单  var StSubjectCode =  "";  //科目代码  if (dynTable.rows(i).cells(2).innerText != "")  {   cc =  dynTable.rows(i).cells(2).innerText;  }  if (dynTable.rows(i).cells(3).innerText != "")  {   io = dynTable.rows(i).cells(3).innerText;  }  if (dynTable.rows(i).cells(5).innerText != "")  {   StSubjectCode = dynTable.rows(i).cells(5).innerText;  }  if (dynTable.rows(i).cells(7).innerText != "")  {   //money = dynTable.rows(i).cells(7).innerText;   money = DF_forDight(parseFloat(document.getElementById("StExchangeRate").value)*parseFloat(dynTable.rows(i).cells(7).innerText),2);  }  text = user + " 报销一般费用"  addVoucherRows(i,"tblSAPList",SAPInputXML,pstng_code,StSubjectCode,money,text,cc,io);   }   //创建凭证其余行 //如果不冲销借款 if (DF_getOptionValue("IsBackMoney") == "否") {   text = "支付的其他与投资活动有关的现金";  money = document.all.StActualAppMoney.value;  addVoucherLastRowInfo("50","tblSAPList",SAPInputXML,"",money,text,"075"); } else {  if (document.all.StActualAppMoney.value == 0)  {    text = user + " 归还借款"   subCode = document.all.CustomCode.value;   money = document.all.StAppMoney.value;   addVoucherLastRowInfo("11","tblSAPList",SAPInputXML,subCode,money,text,"");  }  else  {      subCode = document.all.CustomCode.value;   money = document.all.DebitExpenseMoney.value; //冲销借款金额   money2 = document.all.StActualAppMoney.value; //实际报销金额   text = user + " 归还借款"   text2 = "支付的其他与投资活动有关的现金"   //个人账户付冲销借款   addVoucherLastRowInfo("11","tblSAPList",SAPInputXML,subCode,money,text,"");   //银行账户付实际报销金额   addVoucherLastRowInfo("50","tblSAPList",SAPInputXML,"",money2,text2,"075");     }   }}/**************************************函数说明：创建付款行项目阐述说明：pstng_code 记账码;pTable  凭证动态表格ID;inputXML  AddDynRow函数第2个参数subCode  科目代码money  金额text   行项目reasonCode 原因代码******************************************/function addVoucherLastRowInfo(pstng_code,pTable,inputXML,subCode,money,text,reasonCode){  AddDynRow(pTable, inputXML, ''); var dynTable =  document.getElementById(pTable); var j = dynTable.rows.length - 1;  dynTable.rows(j).cells(1).childNodes(0).value = pstng_code; //记账码 dynTable.rows(j).cells(2).childNodes(0).value = subCode;  //科目 dynTable.rows(j).cells(3).childNodes(0).value = money;  //金额 dynTable.rows(j).cells(4).childNodes(0).value = text;  //行项目文本 dynTable.rows(j).cells(5).childNodes(0).value = "";  //成本中心 dynTable.rows(j).cells(6).childNodes(0).value = "";  //内部订单 dynTable.rows(j).cells(7).childNodes(0).value = reasonCode;  //原因代码 }/*************************************函数说明：创建凭证行项目及内容参数说明i    当前行数;pTable   凭证动态表格id;inputXML   AddDynRow函数的第2个参数;pstng_code 记账码;allsubCode 总帐科目;money      金额;text   行项目文本;cc   成本中心;io    内部订单;**************************************/function addVoucherRows(i,pTable,inputXML,pstng_code,allsubCode,money,text,cc,io){  AddDynRow(pTable, inputXML, ''); var dynTable =  document.getElementById(pTable);    dynTable.rows(i).cells(1).childNodes(0).value = pstng_code; //记账码  dynTable.rows(i).cells(2).childNodes(0).value = allsubCode; //总帐科目  dynTable.rows(i).cells(3).childNodes(0).value = money;  //金额  dynTable.rows(i).cells(4).childNodes(0).value = text;  //行项目文本  dynTable.rows(i).cells(5).childNodes(0).value = cc;  //成本中心  dynTable.rows(i).cells(6).childNodes(0).value = io;  //内部订单}

// -->

input.onclick: /*本按钮的作用是根据key值初始化Jco配置信息*/ var key="1"; //此处的key值就是此表单在配置库中 做相应交互应用时用到的key值配置。 DC_InitConfiguration(key);
DC_WriteToSAP("","0"); /* 函数DF_WriteToSAP(key,runmode)参数说明： key：配置表单的key值，不输入默认为0 runmode：运行方式,为"0"代表代理方式；为"1"代表servlet方式，其他值默认代理方式 */

// 此按钮是用来展示最近一次的交互信息 var url=""; if(document.all("DcLogUID").value!="") { url="/Produce/DigiChannelJCoLog.nsf/0/"+document.all("DcLogUID").value+"?opendocument" window.open(url,'',''); } else { alert("未找到相应日志！"); } return false;
reloadFlag = "yes"; // 此按钮在“1.装载”按钮之前执行
parseFlag = "yes"; //此按钮在“3.解析”按钮执行之前执行

GuanJunKK_ButtonFlag="yes"; if(document.all("TFCurNodeID").value == "FlowStartNode") { arrField=new Array(); arrRemind=new Array(); var nid = 0; arrField[nid] = "StBXPsnCN"; arrRemind[nid] = "请选择报销人" nid++; arrField[nid] = "DeptName"; arrRemind[nid] = "请选择所属部门" nid++; arrField[nid] = "StPayCompany"; arrRemind[nid] = "请选择所属公司" nid++; arrField[nid] = "StPayCompanyCode"; arrRemind[nid] = "请填写公司代码" nid++; arrField[nid] = "StCurrencyType"; arrRemind[nid] = "请选择币种" nid++; arrField[nid] = "StExchangeRate"; arrRemind[nid] = "请填写汇率" nid++; arrField[nid] = "IsBackMoney"; arrRemind[nid] = "请选择是否冲销借款" nid++; if(DF_getOptionValue("IsBackMoney") == "是") { arrField[nid] = "CustomCode"; arrRemind[nid] = "客户编号系统中未能找到，您不能提交。" //arrField[nid] = "DebitExpenseMoney"; //arrRemind[nid] = "请填写冲销金额。" //DebitExpenseMoney nid++; } arrField[nid] = "StPayType"; arrRemind[nid] = "请选择付款方式" nid++; var sptype = DF_getOptionValue("StPayType"); if(sptype == "银行卡") { arrField[nid] = "BankInfo"; arrRemind[nid] = "请选择对应银行" nid++; arrField[nid] = "StMyBankNum"; arrRemind[nid] = "请填写银行卡信息" nid++; } if(!DF_checkInput(arrField,arrRemind)) return false; if(DF_getOptionValue("IsBackMoney") == "是") { if(document.all("EX_FLAG").value != "X" && document.all("EX_FLAG").value != "N") { alert("请点击查询个人借款金额"); return false } //冲销借款验证 if (document.all.DebitExpenseMoney.value == "" || document.all.DebitExpenseMoney.value == 0) { alert("请填写冲销借款"); document.all.DebitExpenseMoney.style.background = "yellow"; return false; } } var tblObj = document.all("tblDynList"); if(tblObj.rows.length < 2) { alert("对不起，请添加报销明细"); return false } //表格必填控制 if(JudgeDynTblValues() == false) return false if(document.all("ConBudFlag").value == "1") { //开始环节获取预算 if(CallBudgetNum() == false) return false //开始环节保存预算相关数据,验证是否超预算 if(ExpSetField() == false) return false } //金额控制 var aMon = parseFloat(document.all("StAppMoney").value).toFixed(2); if(DF_getOptionValue("IsBackMoney") == "是") { //冲销借款处理 if(document.all("DebitMoney").value == "") document.all("DebitMoney").value = "0" if(document.all("DebitExpenseMoney").value == "") document.all("DebitExpenseMoney").value = "0" var dMon = parseFloat(document.all("DebitExpenseMoney").value); var sMon = parseFloat(document.all("DebitMoney").value); if(parseFloat(document.all("DebitExpenseMoney").value) > parseFloat(document.all("DebitMoney").value)) { alert("对不起，冲销借款金额不能大于借款金额"); return false } if(dMon > aMon) { alert("对不起，冲销借款金额不能大于实际报销金额"); return false } } } // 生成凭证验证 if (document.all.VoucherCreateFlag.value == "1") { //alert(document.getElementById("StFlag_1").value) if (document.getElementById("StFlag_1").value == undefined) { alert("系统正在和SAP交互需要几秒中，请稍候..."); return false; } //注释信息 //if(!(document.getElementById("StFlag_1").value == "X")) //{ //alert("请生成凭证!"); //return false; //} } //保存动态表格 SaveDynTable(); GuanJunKK_ButtonFlag="no";
